channel.title: CVE Feed for Tad -- Tad Book3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tad -- Tad Book3

item.title: CVE-2021-41974|2024-08-04T03:22:25.807Z -- tad -- tad%20book3
item.description: Tad Book3 editing book page does not perform identity verification. Remote attackers can use the vulnerability to view and modify arbitrary content of books without permission.

item.title: CVE-2021-41563|2024-08-04T03:15:29.138Z -- tad -- tad%20book3
item.description: Tad Book3 editing book function does not filter special characters. Unauthenticated attackers can remotely inject JavaScript syntax and execute stored XSS attacks.
